ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@decipher.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 9:20 AM To: eqbards@onelist.com Subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 9:20 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs

Everyone here is thinking about what's the norm in the current
game. Max hit on non-plane Norrath is like 400 dmg per strike,
and that's rare. Max hit on planar realms is in the thousands.
Kunark gonna be a bunch of L40 mobs? Hell no. Everything is
gonna have DT, and melee in the 500-1000s... I have no doubt about
it. I was right about the L60, and about the spells per level,
so my track record here is pretty good =)

Harmonic.


------------------------------------------------------------------------


When Gordon says that some of the new mobs will make Vox/Nag look like lawn
trash you bet we need better songs. When many of the other classes are
getting group buffing spells our songs need to keep pace with this power up.
Many of the classes are getting insta-kill spells at 60th (Wizards:
Distentagrate. Necros/Clerics: Banish Undead, Magicians: Banish Summoned)
This is the level of power 60th lvl groups will have. Makes me think I
undershoot on my song ideas.

Rokenn
